info.name: Connectwise
info.description:
# ConnectWise Collection Setup

Before using the connector, you will need to update the Collection Authorization and Variables tabs with your credentials and server address as configured in Connectwise.
[More information here](https://github.com/ethan-sorenson/SmartConnectConnectWise/wiki/Getting-Started#create-your-api-member)

request.description: After all Items have been recieved and marked closed the POs come here.
